div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1742 Mingechaur environs, S of the Kura (anc. Cyrus) River, c. 240 km. E of Baku, Azerbaidzhan, in anc. Armenia, 1949 Burial: mid 1st cent. B.C. Contents: 5 AR. From a burial Phraates III: 1 dr. (Sellwood 33) Mithradates III: 2 dr. (1 as Sellwood 40) Orodes II: 2 dr. (1 as Sellwood 47/24) Disposition: Baku â€ Pakhomov, Material'naia kul'tura Azerbaidzhana 2 (Baku, 1951), pp. 145-6 Pakhomov VI, no. 1544
